short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stream a Chrome tab to Threetee.me's video and audio service.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stream video and audio into Second Life from a browser tab, game, application or monitor to share with friends in-world using the Linden Lab's built-in browser, parcel media and the Threetee.me service.

This extension creates video and audio files using royalty free, open source codecs (VP8, VP9, and OPUS) for use with the MPEG-DASH standard to allow for various media streaming options, including audio-only and multi-resolution video.

Site is in active development with some advertised features and iOS support on the way.
